Jackson & Wilson is a respected, distinguished and established law firm with an outstanding reputation. Since 1986, we have offered full negotiation, settlement, trial and appellate services at the state and federal court level for most matters involving severe injury and wrongful death.

Since 1986, we have dedicated our careers to representing families and children hurt by the indifference, negligence and wrongful conduct of others. Standing up against the powerful insurance companies and their armies of lawyers, we have helped these families through the darkest moments of their lives to overcome tremendous challenges. Our passionate advocacy for our clients has earned us the respect and recognition of our clients and other attorneys across the country.

Areas of emphasis include personal injury, wrongful death, product liability, professional malpractice (medical, legal and other professionals), general negligence, boating accidents, and insurance bad faith.

Since its inception, Jackson & Wilson has provided sophisticated legal services to individual and corporate clients with aggressive representation and personalized care. Large-firm senior attorney experience without large-firm overhead has resulted in consistent client satisfaction, at a reasonable cost, without compromising excellence or timeliness.

Jackson & Wilson has not only dedicated its efforts to preserving the right to trial by jury for all consumers, but also in protecting consumer rights by assisting persons and businesses sustaining injuries or damages as a result of wrongful conduct, or preventing injury from occurring through efforts to secure safe products, a safe workplace, a clean environment, and quality health care. We believe our proven ability in obtaining just settlements and awards for our clients is directly attributable to our determination, spirit and commitment to our clients' cases.

Our professional relationship with each client is very similar to a partnership. As partners, we work closely with our clients to assure informed decision-making, leading to positive results. And while many defense attorneys and insurance companies believe our attitude towards litigation is "aggressive" or "tough," we are convinced it reflects a commitment to our clients' causes and our passion for justice and fairness. Although a trial litigation firm, Jackson & Wilson also practices preventative law by assisting it's clients with proven techniques seeking to anticipate and avoid potential legal problems.

We are proud to point out that our firm also has a major commitment to pro-bono representation and community service. Its members are deeply committed to serving their clients, the legal profession, and our local community. Learn more about Jackson & Wilson by visiting our web site at www.jacksonwilson.com

FREE consultations by telephone, email or in the office. No recovery... no fee!
